title: Should Koman make an entrance on the Boards?
body:
Hello community!
Some of you may remember me, I was the creator of Koman, The Dark Guardian (The Wolf Prince) on the original forums. To my surprise, it was one of the most viewed concepts on the forums, with over 13k views. Now that the original forums have been removed, I have only one question to ask. Should I put Koman on the boards?

replies.body: I feel like the only reason it got as many views as it did was because you kept bumping the thread long after it had died. Don't get me wrong man, I'm glad you're passionate about your champ and always looking to improve on him, but if the creator has 3 posts in a row without anyone commenting, that's a bad sign.

> [{quoted}](name=Lonely Flame,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=sKg7cBLL,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-02-01T04:05:45.048+0000)
>
> I feel like the only reason it got as many views as it did was because you kept bumping the thread long after it had died. Don't get me wrong man, I'm glad you're passionate about your champ and always looking to improve on him, but if the creator has 3 posts in a row without anyone commenting, that's a bad sign.

I had to do that xDDD
I still think the one I made (Kaze the Breaker of the Winds) at least his E & R should be reviewed by Riot, not to be arrogant but I still truly think both could be really good mechanics..
